oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Southern Coffin and Casket Company on fire
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Southern Coffin and Casket Company is seen burning. Fire fighters can be seen holding a water hose towards the blaze. There is an unidentified house on left. The first occured at the same time as G. N. Mize and Sons Lumber Company burned.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fires; Fire fighters; Firefighting equipment; Buildings
